mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT MIN(room_price) FROM room r where h.HOTEL_NO = r.hotel_no) as lowPrice, (SELECT filename_org FROM image WHERE no = #{hotel_no} limit 1) AS filename FROM hotel h where state_code = ${state_code} LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM district where district_code LIKE '${state_code}%'
SELECT * FROM image where no = #{room_no} AND image_type = 'ROOM'
SELECT * FROM favorite WHERE guest_no= #{guest_no} and hotel_no=#{hotel_no}
